text: Aloyzas Kveinys (9 July 1962 — 26 July 2018) was a Lithuanian chess player. He was awarded the Grandmaster title in 1992. He was born in Mažeikiai, Lithuania. Kveinys was awarded the Soviet Master of Sport title for chess in 1981. He won the Lithuanian championship 5 times: in 1983 (shared with Eduardas Rozentalis),Championship of Lithuania, Vilnius, 1983.03.01-24 1986,Championship of Lithuania, Vilnius, 1986.04.10-25 2001 (shared with Šarūnas Šulskis), 2008 and 2012.ch-LTU 2012 In 2010 he won a tournament in Moss, Norway. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Lithuanian sportspeople Category:Chess grandmasters
title: Aloyzas Kveinys
